title: Best of the Program | Guests: Adam Curry & Kevin Freeman | 9/28/22
description:
Adam Curry, the co-host of "No Agenda," joins to share everything you need to know about Bitcoin and what the federal government says about cryptocurrency. Ryan Gorman, host of "The Ryan Gorman Show" on WFLA in Tampa, joins to discuss Hurricane Ian and the catastrophic damage it could do to Florida. BlazeTV host of "Economic War Room" Kevin Freeman joins to discuss whether the current downfall of America is due to incompetence or something intentional.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
